ie.wit.application.service.data

Class UserDataService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.wit.application.service.data.UserDataService

  • public class UserDataService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class abstracts the details of dealing with the Firebase Database. An ArrayList<User> is maintained in sync with firebase to provide data to the rest of the app.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserDataService()
      Instantiates a new User data service.
